acceptance_criteria: ENVIRONMENT.md matches code constants; markdownlint passes.

title: Ensure CI runs Fantomas format check
P0 Bootstrap script: restore tools/packages + output
description: Extend scripts/bootstrap.ps1 to run dotnet tool restore and restore NuGet packages for chosen build/test targets; print next commands and elapsed time on success/failure.
acceptance_criteria: bootstrap.ps1 performs tool restore + package restore; prints next steps (validate -Fast) and elapsed time; exits 0 on success.
notes: bootstrap.ps1 restores tools and src/Grace.sln packages, prints next steps and elapsed time. Ran pwsh ./scripts/bootstrap.ps1 -SkipDocker -CI successfully.

title: P0 CI workflow: validate -Full on main/nightly
description: Extend validate workflow to run pwsh ./scripts/validate.ps1 -Full on main pushes and/or nightly schedule; ensure Docker available for Aspire tests.
acceptance_criteria: Full validation runs on main/nightly and fails if full suite fails; logs show stage failures.
notes: validate.yml runs -Full on main pushes and nightly schedule with docker info step.

title: P0 Define bootstrap/validate semantics + acceptance
description: Draft exact behavior for scripts (flags, working dir vs explicit paths, format check strategy, build/test targets) and failure/success outputs; include 'I know I'm done when…' checks.
acceptance_criteria: Issue contains concrete command list for bootstrap/validate, flag behavior, and acceptance checks for success/failure paths.
notes:
Proposed semantics:
bootstrap.ps1
- StrictMode, Continue='Stop'.
- Flags: -SkipDocker, -CI (no prompts), -Verbose (PS standard).
- Checks: PowerShell 7.x (PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major -ge 7), dotnet available (Get-Command dotnet), dotnet SDK resolves to net10 (dotnet --version + optionally dotnet --list-sdks; if global.json missing, warn), Docker running unless -SkipDocker (docker info).
- Actions: dotnet tool restore; dotnet restore src/Grace.sln (or explicit projects if needed).
- Output: grouped headings (Prereqs/Restore/Next steps), print elapsed time on success/failure. Exit 0 on success, non-zero otherwise.

validate.ps1
- StrictMode, stop-on-error, grouped output: Format, Build, Test. Always prints elapsed time.
- Flags: -Fast (default), -Full, -SkipFormat/-SkipBuild/-SkipTests, -Configuration (default Release).
- Format stage: dotnet tool restore; run pinned Fantomas against src/ using src/fantomas-config.json. Prefer dotnet tool run fantomas --check src --config src/fantomas-config.json; if --check not reliable, run format then git status --porcelain diff and fail with guidance.
- Build stage: dotnet build src/Grace.Server/Grace.Server.fsproj -c <config>; dotnet build src/Grace.CLI/Grace.CLI.fsproj -c <config>; optional Grace.SDK depending on inventory.
- Test stage: -Fast runs dotnet test src/Grace.CLI.Tests/Grace.CLI.Tests.fsproj -c <config> --no-build. -Full runs that plus dotnet test src/Grace.Server.Tests/Grace.Server.Tests.fsproj -c <config> --no-build (Aspire/Docker).

Acceptance checks for scripts:
- bootstrap: missing docker => fail with actionable message unless -SkipDocker; missing dotnet/pwsh => fail; tool restore + package restore succeed; prints next steps.
- validate: any stage failure => non-zero exit; formatting drift yields actionable guidance; -Fast avoids Docker; -Full exercises Aspire tests.

title: P0 Add .config/dotnet-tools.json with pinned Fantomas
description: Create local tool manifest at repo root and pin fantomas-tool version; ensure validate uses dotnet tool run.
acceptance_criteria: dotnet tool restore succeeds at repo root; dotnet tool run fantomas --version matches pinned version.
notes: Added .config/dotnet-tools.json pinning fantomas-tool 4.7.9. dotnet tool restore + dotnet tool run fantomas --version succeeded.

title: Fix verbose parse result option handling
P0 Inventory current build/test/format commands
description: Read AGENTS.md, src/AGENTS.md, src/docs/ASPIRE_SETUP.md, src/fantomas-config.json, src/.editorconfig; locate sln/projects/tests and existing scripts; identify fast vs full test candidates.
acceptance_criteria: Notes captured in issue: canonical build targets, fast tests, full tests, format config paths, any existing scripts/tools.
notes:
Inventory summary:
- Solution: src/Grace.sln
- Projects: Grace.Server, Grace.CLI, Grace.SDK, Grace.Actors, Grace.Shared, Grace.Types, Grace.Load; tests: Grace.CLI.Tests, Grace.Server.Tests
- Format config: src/fantomas-config.json; .editorconfig lives under src/
- Current guidance: dotnet build --configuration Release; dotnet test --no-build; run fantomas . after F# changes (root + project AGENTS).
- Aspire: src/docs/ASPIRE_SETUP.md (Aspire app host in Grace.Aspire.AppHost; tests reuse running emulators)
- Grace.Server.Tests uses [<SetUpFixture>] in namespace Grace.Server.Tests and AspireTestHost.startAsync() which spins containers; first call must be POST /owner/create per src/Grace.Server.Tests/AGENTS.md.
- Fast tests candidate: src/Grace.CLI.Tests/Grace.CLI.Tests.fsproj (non-Docker). Full tests: src/Grace.Server.Tests/Grace.Server.Tests.fsproj (Aspire).
- No scripts/ directory currently in repo root.
